DOC.brief_summary: Use Clearpath facilitate successful completion colonoscopy procedures sub-optimal preparation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient 1870 year 2 . Scheduled colonoscopy 3 . Providing informed consent 1 . Known large polyp ( > 2 cm ) polypectomy 2 . Inflammatory Bowel Disease ( IBD ) 3 . Previous colonic surgery 4 . Known suspected stricture 5 . Significant co morbidity 6 . Significant diverticular disease 7 . Contraindicated receive oral Sodium Picosulfate solution
